name: Master of None DEMO
description:
Master of None is a death-game styled murder mystery in which the player must use the abilities of the two protaganists separately in order to solve the case. It's styled heavily off of the danganronpa games, in which 16 participants are trapped in a strange location and are forced to kill each other to escape.

The demo contains the portion of the game in which the player meets the cast, taken directly from the game script.
